name: Apple iPhone 16
description: The Apple iPhone 16 is a high-end smartphone with a large display, powerful A16 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, 5G connectivity, and a triple-camera setup with ProRAW and ProRes video recording capabilities.

name: Samsung Galaxy S25
description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is a high-end Android smartphone with a large display, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a quad-camera setup with 108MP main sensor.

name: Samsung S22 Ultra
description: The Samsung S22 Ultra is a premium smartphone with a large display, powerful Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, and a quad-camera setup with 108MP main sensor.

name: Google Pixel 9 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 9 Pro is a flagship smartphone with a large display, powerful Tensor G3 chip, and advanced camera system. It features a 6.7-inch OLED display, 5G connectivity, and a triple-camera setup with advanced computational photography features.
